chat_history.message:
Hello,

My product iPhone 13 has the above problem:
When inserting the charging cable, wobble contact in the charging socket. This leads to the phone being very difficult to charge, as the contact is lost.
Thank you for your help,

Hallo,

der Verkäufer kann die Rücksendung aufgrund des folgenden Problems noch nicht durchführen: Sonstiges.
Er hat weitere Details in dieser Nachricht hinterlegt: Dear Backcare,

The customer initially purchased two phones, can we check with the customer that he only wishes to send back this phone only for repair/replacement? Thank you.

Regards,
CH

Dear ecomobile

Unfortunately, I do not understand your message.

The customer has returned a device with the following order number 40484917 and would like to receive an exchange.

Regards,
Angelica from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We noticed that the customer ordered two iPhone 13 devices, one in red and one in starlight. So far, we have only received the red iPhone from the customer. Hence, we are only confirming whether if the customer intended to return just the red phone. Your assistance is greatly appreciated. Thank you for your cooperation.

Regards,
JY

Dear ecomobile

Only the iPhone 13 256GB - red

Regards,
Angelica from the Back Care Team

Dear Backcare,

We take note of this. We will proceed with the necessary actions soon. In the meantime, please do not refund the customer.

Regards,
JY

Hello ecomobile,

You have received the product for repair/exchange the 05/06/2024. 

The delay to repair or exchange the product is 3 days for technical issue. 

Without answer with a valid tracking link before the 12/04/2024 we will refund the customer.

Thank you for understanding,
Angelica from Back Market

Dear Backcare,

Unfortunately, our repair team is unable to fix the issue and we do not have any available stocks for replacement. Instead, we have refunded the customer.

Regards,
JH
